description:
This market will resolve to the team that wins the CBLOL Cup 2026 scheduled for Jan 17 - Feb 28. 

If at any point it becomes impossible for the listed team to win the CBLOL Cup 2026 (e.g. they are mathematically eliminated), the corresponding market will resolve to "No".

If the CBLOL Cup 2026 is cancelled, postponed after March 11, 2026, or there is otherwise no winner declared within that timeframe, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If multiple teams are declared winners, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the tournament organizer, Riot Games (https://lolesports.com/). However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used (e.g., Liquipedia at https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/CBLOL/2026/Cup).

events.title: CBLOL Cup 2026: Winner

question: Will FURIA win CBLOL Cup 2026?
